name: Stockline
long_description:
Stockline is an AI-native ERP for food wholesalers. Our agents eliminate human labor for repetitive tasks, starting with order entry. 

In 3 months, we went from 0 to $230k in ARR. The market is a $25b opportunity. 

Before food reaches your plate, thereâ€™s a $990b+ industry still relying on humans doing manual retyping and copy paste into outdated ERPs. Ultimately, we replace clunky software with an ERP that has AI employees at its core. 


Team is 2 Polytechnique alums who dropped out of Stanford and MIT. Mariem is daughter of the fish industry and Moncef started coding and building softwares at 13.
